name: GGJAM 2022
description:
Context and presentation :

Game developped during the Global Gamejam 2022. 

Initial goal was to travel between past and present, to make your present great again. 

Due to organizational complications, this is a demonstrative prototype.

Inputs :

  • Movement : Z(Forward), Q(Go left), S(Backward), D(Go right)
  • Actions : R(Pick up object), E(Interact)

Credit :

Programmer : RRooly

2&3 D Artist : DeusAmas, Meiliallane, Pendilium, Ryoku974

Sound designer : Jayd_beats
